title: RIDERS – BMX, Skate, Scooter
description:
Progress faster in any action sport. RIDERS is a learning community with over 2,500 tricks on bmx, skateboard, snowboard, scooter, and many more. Download the app to join the 850,000 riders community that shares useful tips and inspires you to keep learning.
WATCH HOW-TOS
Learn by watching video tutorials for thousands of tricks from the top professional riders. Get a personalized plan which will easily adjust to your level and always hint which trick to try next.
MEET A LOCAL COACH
Book one-on-one training sessions led by local coaches, whether it’s for multiple days or just an intro lesson.
Whether you are a newbie or have some experience, RIDERS has everything to feed your motivation and improve your skills. Choose from summer or winter sports — snowboard, bmx, skateboard, ski, scooter, surf, wakeboard, parkour, longboard, mountain bike, kiteboard, fmx, trampoline, aggressive inline and windsurf.
For Beginners:
• Get free access to 2,500 video tutorials
• Find nearby riders and coaches
• Share videos to get relevant feedback
• Track your progress to get recommendations
• Ask a question and hear back quickly
For Coaches:
• Add your private, group, or long-term offer
• Set your own hourly rate
• Access new clients from around the world
• No commission
Join the world’s biggest riders community to get both the expertise you want and the motivation you need for continuous and fast progression. It is equally good for beginners as well as for riders who learn more advanced tricks.
